author: Owen Ruggiero
comment: Beautiful watchface. Would really like to see customization for colors!!!

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! You can choose from a few pre-defined color palettes in the settings at the moment.

author: Cheryl Dedman
comment: Loved this app so simple to use and lovely colours :)
title: Miss Cheryl Dedman

author: Shueng Li
comment: The best watch face there is. Great animation and very stylish. I would love to see more watch faces like this

author: Nick Sutrich
comment: Truly excellent watch face, would love to see some more colors (or even customizable ones)!

author: Ievgen Palamarchuk
comment: The best watch I have used so far.
title: Astonishing!

author: Dave Combe
comment: I have hunted high and low for a good watch face worth the money. This one may be free but is easily worth more than most that charge as it's smooth, animated, clear and useful. And it doesn't destroy your battery.
title: Easily one of the best

author: Trace Anderson
comment: One of the best watch faces. Smart features and you are able to customize the color scheme ! Love it.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you! I'm really glad you like it.

title: The best

author: Bill Strathearn
comment: So useful. So simple. So beautiful. Love it!

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you! I'm really glad you like it.

author: Liam Fruzyna
comment: A very minimal but good looking watch face that has some great features. Dev is also awesome, he is very timely with adding feature requests.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! The latest update adds the option to display seconds.

title: Awesome Watch Face

author: Jason Shawn
comment: Any way to change it from 24hr format to 12hr?  Thank you

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: The latest update added this option, thank you for your suggestion!

title: Sweet watch face
